Description:
Zone In On Superb Scope
Seconds to citybound trams, delicious coffee, tempting meals and boutique shopping in North Essendon Village, and moments from tranquil Woodlands Park, this double fronted, three bedroom period home resides on approximately 473m2 in a sought after locale within the Strathmore College zone. After fifty years in one family it's finally available, presenting an array of options including renovating, building a stylish new home and developing (subject to council approval). Living spaces include a lounge with heating and cooling and kitchen/meals with gas stove, complemented by a deep rear garden and bungalow. Each bedroom is comfortably able to accommodate a double bed, and the accessible bathroom offers a walk-in shower, toilet and pedestal basin. Off street parking is available at the front of the house, and there's a storage shed at the rear. Renowned schools, popular Essendon DFO, freeways and CityLink are all within a short drive, underlining the enticing lifestyle possibilities afforded by this winning locale.
